title: Project-Based Programming Education Grounded in Subgoal Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centered learning environment with real job-linked project execution

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more programming projects using the Subgoal Learning Framework
Learners can self-generate subgoal comments with over 80% accuracy during problem-solving processes
Learners demonstrate a 30%+ improvement in written response rates for AP exam-style practice assignments compared to baseline

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
